t: Amazon.com: The Wrath Of God - Buffalo Blizzard (History Channel) : Movies & TV
s: Buffalo, New York, receives on average 93 inches of snow each year, but by mid-January 1977, the city had already received 126. Nature would soon deliver a blow beyond anyone's imagination. Join us as we relive the six-day blizzard that wreaked havoc across the region and caused President Carter ...
